医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究显示，小儿心脏移植等候名单未能优先考虑病情最严重的患者斯坦福大学医学院专家领导的一项新研究表明，美国各地用于心脏移植儿童等候名单的方法并不总是将病情最严重的患者排在第一位。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Pediatric-heart-transplant-waitlist-fails-to-prioritize-sickest-病人-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Pediatric-heart-transplant-waitlist-fails-to-prioritize-sickest-病人-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0985e02c-104a-46b7-94ae-3e24e1e905c3 Wed, 28 Aug 2024 14:14:04 -0400 Pediatric heart transplant waitlist fails to prioritize sickest patients, study shows
TCT 2024将展示介入心血管医学的最新进展心血管研究基金会很高兴地宣布将在 TCT 2024 上展示最新的临床试验和科学成果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/TCT-2024-to-feature-latest-advances-in-interventional-cardioangio-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/TCT-2024-to-feature-latest-advances-in-interventional-cardioangio-medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0a5f679-f0ca-4de5-9051-1d3ff3bdcd0a Wed, 28 Aug 2024 14:06:13 -0400 TCT 2024 to feature latest advances in interventional cardiovascular medicine
研究强调血液表观遗传学在痴呆症风险评估中的潜力新研究表明，血液中的表观遗传标记可能有助于了解痴呆症风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Research-highlights-pottial-of-blood-epigenics-for-dementia-risk-assessment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Research-highlights-pottial-of-blood-epigenics-for-dementia-risk-assessment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4e8e2d2-9e96-4aee-9bb5-6524ff494cfb Wed, 28 Aug 2024 12:23:00 -0400 Research highlights potential of blood epigenetics for dementia risk assessment
面对面的接触可以降低老年人的孤独感德克萨斯大学奥斯汀分校的一组研究人员表示，面对面的接触有助于降低老年人的孤独感，但其他保持联系的方式，如打电话、发电子邮件或发短信，在降低孤独感方面并不那么有效。和密歇根大学发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/In-person-contact-decreases-levels-of-loneiness-in-older-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/In-person-contact-decreases-levels-of-loneiness-in-older-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01f6f472-7a4f-4629-bff9-ad056756e0bf Wed, 28 Aug 2024 12:19:58 -0400 In-person contact decreases levels of loneliness in older people
基于机械臂、支持 5G 的远程超声心动图显示出较高的诊断准确性今年在英国伦敦举行的 2024 年 ESC 大会（8 月 30 日至 9 月 2 日）上提出的新研究表明，使用 5G 蜂窝网络远程执行超声心动图与心脏病专家亲自执行的准确性相似。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Robotic-arm-based-5G-enabled-remote-echocardiograms-show-high-diagnostic-accuracy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Robotic-arm-based-5G-enabled-remote-echocardiograms-show-high-diagnostic-accuracy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8215bb4-9335-449d-9784-e28c396232a4 Wed, 28 Aug 2024 12:16:08 -0400 Robotic arm-based, 5G-enabled remote echocardiograms show high diagnostic accuracy
消遣性吸毒者重复发生心血管事件的可能性是其三倍今年在英国伦敦举行的 2024 年 ESC 大会（8 月 30 日至 9 月 2 日）上提出的新研究表明，在入住重症心脏监护病房 (ICCU) 的患者中，近期有吸毒史的患者发生此类事件的可能性是其三倍与一年内没有重复发生严重心血管事件史的人相比。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Recreational-drug-users-third-times-more-likely-to-experience-repeat-cardioangio-events.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Recreational-drug-users-third-times-more-likely-to-experience-repeat-cardioangio-events.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0931216-c0f2-4f70-99e9-82f98c02b139 Wed, 28 Aug 2024 11:12:11 -0400 Recreational drug users three times more likely to experience repeat cardiovascular events
伦敦大学学院的研究显示，疼痛是长期新冠肺炎的主要症状伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，疼痛可能是长期感染新冠病毒的人报告的最普遍、最严重的症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Pain-emerges-as-dominant-symptom-in-long-Covid-UCL-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Pain-emerges-as-dominant-symptom-in-long-Covid-UCL-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39ea2053-1a5e-4369-a533-baed64e8f0e8 Wed, 28 Aug 2024 10:38:34 -0400 Pain emerges as dominant symptom in long Covid, UCL study reveals
新植入物为脊髓损伤后神经修复带来希望RCSI 医学与健康科学大学的一个研究小组开发了一种新的植入物，可以传输电信号，并可能有潜力促进脊髓损伤后神经细胞（神经元）的修复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/New-implant-offers-hope-for-nerve-repair-after-spinal-cord-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/New-implant-offers-hope-for-nerve-repair-after-spinal-cord-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=715746e0-0445-481d-8d97-8f062a61c96a Wed, 28 Aug 2024 10:29:00 -0400 New implant offers hope for nerve repair after spinal cord injury
新型抗菌化合物有望预防牙周病牙周病是由牙周病原菌感染引起的影响口腔和内部健康的炎症性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/New-antibacterial-compound-shows-promise-for-preventing-periodontal-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/New-antibacterial-compound-shows-promise-for-preventing-periodontal-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c428c21f-3c09-4d4d-b9eb-902334ddc599 Wed, 28 Aug 2024 09:58:52 -0400 New antibacterial compound shows promise for preventing periodontal disease
研究引入了一种绘制蛋白质-受体相互作用图谱的新方法FDA 批准的药物中，有三分之一的药物靶向分布在人体细胞表面的单个受体超家族。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Study-introduces-a-novel-approach-to-mapping- Protein-receptor-interactions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Study-introduces-a-novel-approach-to-mapping- Protein-receptor-interactions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e3c89d6-4a74-487d-beef-5a6b5fe3bb3a Wed, 28 Aug 2024 09:53:10 -0400 Study introduces a novel approach to mapping protein-receptor interactions
